param.name: AZI
param.dialogReference:
Azimuth

Floating point

Minimum: 0.000000

Maximum: 360.000000

Default: 180.000000

direction of sun (degree, clockwise from North)

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Method

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Cosine Correction (Teillet et al. 1982)

[1] Cosine Correction (Civco 1989)

[2] Minnaert Correction

[3] Minnaert Correction with Slope (Riano et al. 2003)

[4] Minnaert Correction with Slope (Law & Nichol 2004)

[5] C Correction

[6] Normalization (after Civco, modified by Law & Nichol)

Default: 4

param.name: MAXCELLS
param.dialogReference:
Maximum Cells (C Correction Analysis)

Integer

Minimum: 10

Default: 1000

Maximum number of grid cells used for trend analysis as required by C correction.

tool.summary: Topographic correction for satellite imagery's bands using a Digital Elevation Model to estimate and remove the shading effect for the given position of the Sun at acquisition time.
